data.actual_result: Nothing happens unless you click on it again
data.expected_result: A new subsettings tab should open
data.short_description: Subsettings in User Settings not opening on first click after scrolling all the way up or down
data.steps_to_repro: - Open User Settings - Scroll all the way down very quicky as if you had to scroll through 500 messages - Click on any of the visible subsettings (Languages, Behavior, etc)
